name: Big Toe Pose
description: Padangusthasana (Big Toe Pose) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Grab your big toe(s) and lengthen your spine, stretching hamstrings and calming the mind.  Maintain a straight back and engage your core for optimal alignment.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Benefits include hamstring stretch and calming the mind.  Keep your spine long, knees slightly bent if needed, and reach for the floor, lengthening your spine throughout.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging, advanced standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana).  Strengthens legs and core, improves balance and focus.  Maintain a straight spine, engage your core, and lengthen through the sides of your body.
